json.desc:
Welcome to《Plant manor》!
Let's raise succulents on the Internet!

Here is a pot of plants [Portulacaria afra 'Medio-picta'] ，
Click to collect oxygen!
Collected enough oxygen，You can upgrade your succulents。

Upgrade to produce more oxygen at once!
Click to collect oxygen，Can also increase the planting level!
Plant it quickly，See what it looks like。

right，Don’t forget to upgrade your succulents at all times!
There will be some surprises when succulents are upgraded to full level!

This is [Fertilization] [Fertilize] ，Click to use。
 After use:Large amounts of oxygen can be harvested immediately。
There are also [light] and [irrigation] [illumination] 和 [灌溉] !
use [illumination] :Can double the oxygen production of succulents in a certain period of time!
use [灌溉] :It can automatically collect oxygen during irrigation!

After using the props, it will enter the cooldown，If the items are cooling down，
 You can try [Reset All] [Reset all]
This time it is the mall，Can buy oxygen。
But it seems you don’t have diamonds

Congratulations，The leaderboard is open~~~
There are many like-minded friends in it!
Go take a look~
